verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s job approval rating] [V: rose] [ARG4: to its highest level in almost a year] , [ARGM-ADV: according to polling data released Monday by Gallup] .
President Donald Trump ’s job approval rating rose to its highest level in almost a year , [V: according] to polling data released Monday by Gallup .
President Donald Trump ’s job approval rating rose to its highest level in almost a year , according to [ARG1: polling data] [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG0: by Gallup] .
